columns.name: open_graph_description
columns.label: Open Graph description
columns.description: Event view Open Graph description. A one to two sentence description of the Event.

columns.name: open_graph_image
columns.label: Open Graph image
columns.description: Event view Open Graph image. An image representing the Event. Optimal aspect ratio is 1:91:1, e.g. 1200 x 630.

columns.name: featured_image
columns.label: Featured image
columns.description: Event background and hero image (1600 x 620 or similar ratio)

columns.name: card_image
columns.label: Card image
columns.description: Image for Card View and Promospot (360 x 270 or similar ratio)
